apiValue.shortdesc: The BCP-47 language code, such as, "en-US" or "sr-Latn".

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The BCP-47 language code, such as, "en-US" or "sr-Latn". For more information, see http://www.unicode.org/reports/tr35/#Unicode_locale_identifier.

apiValue.shortdesc: Maximum number of results to return.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Maximum number of results to return. Defaults to 10. Does not apply to `VisionCloudTextDetector` and `VisionCloudDocumentTextDetector`.

apiValue.shortdesc: Type of model to use in vision cloud detection API.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Type of model to use in vision cloud detection API. Defaults to `.stable`.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A text line recognized in an image that consists of an array of elements.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A text line recognized in an image that consists of an array of elements.

apiValue.shortdesc: The confidence of the recognized text line.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The confidence of the recognized text line. The value is `nil` for all text recognizers except for cloud text recognizers with model type `VisionCloudTextModelType.dense`.

apiValue.shortdesc: The four corner points of the text line in clockwise order starting with the top left point relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The four corner points of the text line in clockwise order starting with the top left point relative to the image in the default coordinate space. The `NSValue` objects are `CGPoint`s.

apiValue.shortdesc: An array of text elements that make up the line.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An array of text elements that make up the line.

apiValue.shortdesc: The rectangle that contains the text line relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The rectangle that contains the text line relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValue.shortdesc: An array of recognized languages in the text line.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An array of recognized languages in the text line. On-device text recognizers only detect Latin-based languages, while cloud text recognizers can detect multiple languages. If no languages are recognized, the array is empty.

apiValue.shortdesc: String representation of the text line that was recognized.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: String representation of the text line that was recognized.

apiValue.shortdesc: Latest model.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Latest model.

apiValue.shortdesc: Stable model.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Stable model.

apiValue.shortdesc: An array of blocks recognized in the text.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An array of blocks recognized in the text.

apiValue.shortdesc: String representation of the recognized text.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: String representation of the recognized text.

apiValue.shortdesc: Face detection mode code indicating detect more faces and may be more precise in determining values such as position, at the cost of speed.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Face detection mode code indicating detect more faces and may be more precise in determining values such as position, at the cost of speed.

apiValue.shortdesc: Face detection mode code indicating detect fewer faces and may be less precise in determining values such as position, but will run faster.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Face detection mode code indicating detect fewer faces and may be less precise in determining values such as position, but will run faster.

apiValue.shortdesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the bottom and the 0th column is the left side.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the bottom and the 0th column is the left side.

apiValue.shortdesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the bottom and the 0th column is the right side.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the bottom and the 0th column is the right side.

apiValue.shortdesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the left side and the 0th column is the bottom.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the left side and the 0th column is the bottom.

apiValue.shortdesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the left side and the 0th column is the top.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the left side and the 0th column is the top.

apiValue.shortdesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the right side and the 0th column is the bottom.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the right side and the 0th column is the bottom.

apiValue.shortdesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the right side and the 0th column is the top.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the right side and the 0th column is the top.

apiValue.shortdesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the top and the 0th column is the left side.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the top and the 0th column is the left side.

apiValue.shortdesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the top and the 0th column is the right side.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Orientation code indicating the 0th row is the top and the 0th column is the right side.

apiValue.shortdesc: Face classification type indicating it performs all classification.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Face classification type indicating it performs all classification.

apiValue.shortdesc: Face classification type indicating it performs no classification.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Face classification type indicating it performs no classification.

apiValue.shortdesc: Left cheek.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Left cheek.

apiValue.shortdesc: Midpoint of the left ear tip and left ear lobe.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Midpoint of the left ear tip and left ear lobe.

apiValue.shortdesc: Left eye.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Left eye.

apiValue.shortdesc: Center of the bottom lip.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Center of the bottom lip.

apiValue.shortdesc: Left corner of the mouth

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Left corner of the mouth

apiValue.shortdesc: Right corner of the mouth

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Right corner of the mouth

apiValue.shortdesc: Midpoint between the nostrils where the nose meets the face.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Midpoint between the nostrils where the nose meets the face.

apiValue.shortdesc: Right cheek.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Right cheek.

apiValue.shortdesc: Midpoint of the right ear tip and right ear lobe.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Midpoint of the right ear tip and right ear lobe.

apiValue.shortdesc: Right eye.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Right eye.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A text element recognized in an image.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A text element recognized in an image. A text element is roughly equivalent to a space-separated word in most Latin-script languages.

apiValue.shortdesc: The confidence of the recognized text element.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The confidence of the recognized text element. The value is 0 for all text recognizers except for cloud text recognizers with model type `VisionCloudTextModelType.dense`.

apiValue.shortdesc: The four corner points of the text element in clockwise order starting with the top left point relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The four corner points of the text element in clockwise order starting with the top left point relative to the image in the default coordinate space. The `NSValue` objects are `CGPoint`s.

apiValue.shortdesc: The rectangle that contains the text element relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The rectangle that contains the text element relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValue.shortdesc: An array of text lines that make up the block.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An array of text lines that make up the block.

apiValue.shortdesc: An array of recognized languages in the text element.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An array of recognized languages in the text element. On-device text recognizers only detect Latin-based languages, while cloud text recognizers can detect multiple languages. If no languages are recognized, the array is empty.

apiValue.shortdesc: String representation of the text element that was recognized.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: String representation of the text element that was recognized.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A landmark on a human face detected in an image.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A landmark on a human face detected in an image.

apiValue.shortdesc: 2D position of the facial landmark.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: 2D position of the facial landmark.

apiValue.shortdesc: The type of the facial landmark.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The type of the facial landmark.

apiValue.shortdesc: Face landmark detection type indicating it performs all landmark detection.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Face landmark detection type indicating it performs all landmark detection.

apiValue.shortdesc: Face landmark detection type indicating it performs no landmark detection.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Face landmark detection type indicating it performs no landmark detection.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Options for specifying a face detector.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Options for specifying a face detector.

apiValue.shortdesc: Whether to run additional classifiers for characterizing attributes such as smiling.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Whether to run additional classifiers for characterizing attributes such as smiling. Defaults to VisionFaceDetectorClassificationNone.

apiValue.shortdesc: Whether the face tracking feature is enabled in face detection.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Whether the face tracking feature is enabled in face detection. Defaults to NO.

apiValue.shortdesc: Whether to detect no landmarks or all landmarks in face detection.

apiDesc.p: Whether to detect no landmarks or all landmarks in face detection. Processing time increases as the number of landmarks to search for increases, so detecting all landmarks will increase the overall detection time. Defaults to VisionFaceDetectorLandmarkNone.

apiValue.shortdesc: The smallest desired face size.

apiDesc.p: The smallest desired face size. The size is expressed as a proportion of the width of the head to the image width. For example, if a value of 0.1 is specified, then the smallest face to search for is roughly 10% of the width of the image being searched. Defaults to 0.1.

apiValue.shortdesc: Preference for accuracy vs.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Preference for accuracy vs. speed trade-offs in face detection. Defaults to VisionFaceDetectorModeFast.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A human face detected in an image.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A human face detected in an image.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the landmark, if any, of the given type in this detected face.

apiReturn.apiDesc: The landmark of the given type in this face. nil if there isn't one.

apiParam.apiDesc: The type of the facial landmark.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the landmark, if any, of the given type in this detected face.

apiValue.shortdesc: The rectangle that holds the discovered relative to the detected image in the view coordinate system.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The rectangle that holds the discovered relative to the detected image in the view coordinate system.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates whether the detector found the head y euler angle.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates whether the detector found the head y euler angle.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates whether the detector found the head z euler angle.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates whether the detector found the head z euler angle.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates whether a left eye open probability is available.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates whether a left eye open probability is available.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates whether a right eye open probability is available.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates whether a right eye open probability is available.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates whether a smiling probability is available.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates whether a smiling probability is available.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates whether the face has a tracking ID.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates whether the face has a tracking ID.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates the rotation of the face about the vertical axis of the image.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates the rotation of the face about the vertical axis of the image. Positive y euler angle is when the face is turned towards the right side of the image that is being processed.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates the rotation of the face about the axis pointing out of the image.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates the rotation of the face about the axis pointing out of the image. Positive z euler angle is a counter-clockwise rotation within the image plane.

apiValue.shortdesc: All the landmarks.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: All the landmarks.

apiValue.shortdesc: Probability that the face's left eye is open.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Probability that the face's left eye is open.

apiValue.shortdesc: Probability that the face's right eye is open.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Probability that the face's right eye is open.

apiValue.shortdesc: Probability that the face is smiling.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Probability that the face is smiling.

apiValue.shortdesc: The tracking identifier of the face.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The tracking identifier of the face.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: A text block recognized in an image that consists of an array of text lines.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: A text block recognized in an image that consists of an array of text lines.

apiValue.shortdesc: The confidence of the recognized text block.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The confidence of the recognized text block. The value is 0 for all text recognizers except for cloud text recognizers with model type `CloudTextModelType.dense`.

apiValue.shortdesc: The four corner points of the text block in clockwise order starting with the top left point relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The four corner points of the text block in clockwise order starting with the top left point relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValue.shortdesc: The rectangle that contains the text block relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The rectangle that contains the text block relative to the image in the default coordinate space.

apiValue.shortdesc: An array of text lines that make up the block.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An array of text lines that make up the block.

apiValue.shortdesc: An array of recognized languages in the text block.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An array of recognized languages in the text block. On-device text recognizers only detect Latin-based languages, while cloud text recognizers can detect multiple languages. If no languages are recognized, the array is empty.

apiValue.shortdesc: String representation of the text block that was recognized.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: String representation of the text block that was recognized.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: Initializes a VisionImage object with the given image.

apiParam.apiDesc: BitmapData to use in vision detection. The given image should be rotated, so its orientation up. Set to null if using the path param.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Initializes a VisionImage object with the given image.
